comments:
Last night I had a Html file open in the content area it was being browsed with
the internal browser. I had shut the ide down with the browser open in the
content area.

I am using 3.2M2 with drivers/libs recommended for 3.1.
I started eclipse IDE today to find the following error on startup.

Verified that this was already fixed in the v3.2 stream on the 11th, and that I
could reproduce this with the v3.1 stream but not with a current v3.2. This
problem should be resolved when you move up to a new build/milestone.
